short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emphasizes the initial letters of words in paragraphs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows speed reading of paragraphs of text by emphasizing the first few letters or the initial part of a word.

Readers can quickly recognize the word without having to read every letter.

This takes advantage of the brain's ability to recognize words by their shape and initial letters.

All paragraph tags on a page will have the highlighting applied.
